name: Rent (Original Version: The Pet Shop Boys)
lyric:
Rent
林一峰

Lyrics by 猪雄

Look at the two of us in sympathy. With everything we see
I never want anything, it's easy,you buy whatever I need

Look at my hopes, look at my dreams, the currency we've spent
I love you, oh, you pay my rent
I love you, you pay my rent

You phone me in the evening on Hearsay,and bought me caviar
You took me to a restaurant off Broadway to tell me who you are

We never ever argue, we never calculate the currency we've spent
I love you, oh, you pay my rent
I love you, you pay my rent
I love you, OHH...yeah

You dress me up, I'm your puppet (dress me dress me dress me dress me)
You buy me things, I love it (buy me buy me buy me buy me)
You bring me food, I need it (bring me bring me bring me bring me)
You give me love (Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme)
You dress me up, I'm your puppet (dress me dress me dress me dress me)
You buy me things, I love it (buy me buy me buy me buy me)
You bring me food, I need it (bring me bring me bring me bring me)
You give me love (Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme)

And look at the two of us in sympathy, and sometimes ecstasy
Words mean so little, and money less,when you're lying next to me
But look at my hopes, look at my dreams, the currency we've spent
I love you, oh, you pay my rent (It's easy it's so easy)
I love you, you pay my rent

Look at my hopes, look at my dreams, the currency we've spent
I love you, oh, you pay my rent (It's easy it's so easy)
I love you, you pay my rent

comments.brief: 一首被包养歌，都唱的那么潇洒清醒充满正能量=v=
